help-file.title: COMMANDS
help-file.content: Movement: | Communication: NORTH SOUTH EAST WEST UP DOWN | SAY ' SHOUT TELL ASK WHISPER SLEEP WAKE REST SIT STAND FOLLOW | GSAY SPEAK EMOTE IGNORE KNEEL RECLINE ALERT DRAG | PETITION --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Information: | Objects: HELP WHO NEWS MOTD TIME WIZLIST | GET TAKE DROP PUT WEAR GRAB HOLD CREDITS ATTRIBUTES SCORE WORLD | REMOVE GIVE LOCK UNLOCK OPEN CLOSE COMMANDS SPELLS LOOK EXAMINE | FILL POUR TASTE EAT SIP DRINK SEARCH EXITS MAP WEBSITE | INVENTORY EQUIPMENT --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Combat: | Utility: KILL WIELD GLANCE GROUP DISBAND | BUG IDEA TYPO QUIT SAVE RENT CONSIDER PRACTICE TROPHY AGGR FLEE | OFFER CAMP TOGGLE DISPLAY WRITE --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Monetary: | Common help subjects: BALANCE DEPOSIT WITHDRAW EXCHANGE | RACES, INNATE, RULES, PRACTICE, BUY SELL LIST VALUE CURRENCY | SPELLCAST, INDEX, | POLICIES, COMMANDS | <class>, <race>, <spell>, <skill>
